name: Dodg'em
description:
Welcome to Dodg'em!

In this game, you play as a cube. Your goal is to reach the golden cube at the end of a level. But beware though, since there will be enemies that will hunt you down.

You can also trap enemies in some levels, and even pick up power-ups to gain projectile shots.

This is my first game uploaded to Itch.io, so feedback and constructive criticism is much appreciated!
